* BrightBlade smiled as she pulled out her hot-wired gun and aimed at the 
Maximal ship, she had had a chance to repair in her Beast Mode on the way 
there. She fired at one of the top auto-guns and smiled as it exploded, she 
HAD done a good job rewiring this weapon!
BrightBlade looked over at the others as they continued to attack the Ark, 
were they having as much fun as she was?
She sighed, when were the Maximals going to come out and play? She'd love to 
have a chance to shoot at one of them rather then an auto-gun, or maybe even 
have a chance to sneak inside and get the drop on a few.
BrightBlade snickered, she was going to enjoy this! :)
